text: Tsukong (autonym: ') is a Loloish language of Yunnan, China. It is closely related to the Coong language of northwestern Vietnam. ==References== * Udomkool, Kitjapol. 2006. A phonological comparison of selected Bisoid varieties. M.A. dissertation. Chiang Mai: Payap University. Category:Southern Loloish languages Category:Languages of China Category:Languages of Yunnan
title: Tsukong language
